text: Michael Noel Skivington (24 December 1921 – 2 March 2012) was a Scottish professional football centre half who played in the Football League for Gillingham, Leyton Orient and Rochdale. He also played in Scotland for St Anthony's and Alloa Athletic and in Ireland for Dundalk.
